issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
1. Create an app & replace the app.js with the app.js for analytics test in feature test repo
2. Follow the instructions for rightscale from this wiki page: https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tp/Analytics+Test+Plan
3. Build & run the app on BB device
4. Now generate the events using the app

Actual Result:
1. We do not see any new analytics events after they are sent but restarting the app shows us the events
2. Sometimes even after restarting the app we do not see the events

Expected Result:
1. We should see the events every time the are sent
fields.summary: BlackBerry : Analytics events for BB do not show up until we restart the app & sometimes even after restarting
fields.environment:
Environment:
Ti Studio : 3.1.1.201305150313
Ti BB SDK : 3.1.1.v20130521132036
Mac OSX : 10.8.2
win 7
